title: Am I the only one??
body:
Am I the only one who is not happy with the taric update??
Also am I the only one who is not hyped and infact find the buff for mages kind of unnecessary?





Note to self:
Malzhar is op {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 


The shield he gets is bs T_T

but it's fine Ad Assassin is lyf <3

replies.body:
No, you are not the only one. Taric just doesn't feel like taric. And giving malzahar cc immunity?
Why not just make his ult automatically kill on click - that would have the same effect.

Not sure what the point of the zyra remake is. I don't like the vladimir but would have to play a few games first.

It's just like, why?? Riot is just changing shit around just for the sake of changing shit around

hhahaha yes! That's how I feel like and i'm glad that i'm not the only who feels like this. Malzhar is gonna be overused in casual and ranked now. The mages got heavy buff meanwhile the AD assassins got nerfed. Zed's w is now 20 second cooldown and his ad got reduced. Next thing you know Zed's q and e is 10 seconds cd XD

Why are you complaining about his passive when it's Malz's new W that is broken LOL
HIs passive just makes him not worthless.

Malz is not OP. In fact atm he is a pretty bad champion. Like Warwick. Point and click supressions which only work when your team mates have the reactions of a slug.

It's not all nerfs for AD Assassins. They are removing the ability to QSS Zed ult.

For the majority of people, this game is over 5 years old. Its revamps and reworks such as these that keep the game interesting.
wew wew wait. Qss can't remove zed's ult now? C00l
6.9 change. along with the new AP items and stuff. QSS now only removes CC not "all effects"

I like the new taric, AoE stun is awesome (As long as your bastion buddy knows how to move)
And you have an AoE kayle ult (It takes so long to activate and your team mates still run away XD)
